channel.title: Jiajian Fu's site
channel.description: this is Jiajian Fu's profile site

item.title: Art Design｜Vacuum Flourescent Display
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Merging engineering and art has always been my dream. Using my engineering experience in robot design and manufacturing, I designed a clock that was displayed using a vacuum fluorescent display（VFD）tube

item.title: Course Project｜Ergonomics
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Introduction to ergonomics course projects. The operation requirements of tower cranes were analyzed, and a simple, efficient and safe remote tower crane operation mode was designed. Implement simulation with Unity.

item.title: Robot Design｜Bionic Ostrich Robot
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: It is National second prize winning works of the 10th National College Students Mechanical Innovation Design Competition.The funny thing is, it all started with an idea I had in the shower……

item.title: Robot Design｜MX_2 Engineer
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: A comprehensive introduction to MX_2 Engineer from the perspectives of design background, design metrics, mechanical design, hardware design, and software design

item.title: MechaX：About Us
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: Introduction to team MechaX in Chongqing University

item.title: MechaX Robots Overview
item.author: Jiajian Fu
item.description: The display and introduction of all the Robots of the MechaX in the 2023 season
